item.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
item.description: Self-help advice which tells you to become the person you want to be only reinforces the idea that you are not that thing Pursuing something only reinforces that you lack it in the first place.

item.title: The Almanack of Naval Ravikant
item.description: Building Wealth Understand How Wealth Is Created It’s not really about hard work. You can work in a restaurant eighty hours a week, and you’re not going to get rich.

item.title: Deep Work
item.description: “The ability to perform deep work is becoming increasingly rare at exactly the same time it is becoming increasingly valuable in our economy.

item.title: 7 Habits of Highly Effective Teens
item.description: We need a paradigm, paradigm is the way you see something, your point of view. Paradigms need to be principle-centered

item.title: How to Become a Straight-A Student
item.description: “The simple truth is that the brute force techniques used by most students are incredibly inefficient.” - Cal Newport

item.title: Atomic Habits
item.description: ”We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence is not an act, but a habit.” - Aristotle “The costs of your good habits are in the present.
